bmz_id.label: BMZ ID
bmz_id.description: Set the BMZ ID that references the ID in the PureClarity Admin.

pc_bmz_classes.label: CSS Custom Classes
pc_bmz_classes.description: [Optional] Type in a comma seperated list of additional CSS classes to add to the PureClarity BMZ.

pc_bmz_topbuffer.label: Top Buffer (px)
pc_bmz_topbuffer.description: [Optional] Enter the number of pixels to create a buffer above the bmz.

pc_bmz_bottombuffer.label: Bottom Buffer (px)
pc_bmz_bottombuffer.description: [Optional] Enter the number of pixels to create a buffer below the bmz.
